JetBrains Rider is a leading .â€‹NET and game dev IDE. Its robust feature set allows you to develop a wide range of applications, including ASP.â€‹NET and ASP.â€‹NET Core web apps, .â€‹NET desktop applications, services and libraries, Unity and Unreal Engine games, Xamarin apps, MAUI apps, and more.
